page.title: 11ALONG THE ROADSIDE VERGES
page.content: We went out to study the{verges.}First we went to Great Plumstead and spotted 37 different plants.This is a list of some of them:Cowparsley,poppy ,buttercup,daisy,dandelion,clover, goosegrass,dock,nettles,grass,herb robert,ivy,forget-me-not,thistle, rosebay willow herb,foxglove,field speedwell,scarlet pimpernel,bracken, cornflower,gorse,vetch,dog's mercury, holly and ribwort. The verges were between the{hedges}and the road. We spotted a little field mouse eating the seeds of some cow-parsley. The nettles were covered in cuckoo spit.
